description:
With Ryouma gone, Kei`ichiro and Kiriko begin to get closer.  But Kiriko is upset that unlike Chiharu and Hyougo she can`t pilot Susanowo.  Houkouin appears and reassures her, but Houkouin actually wants something else...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les situations amoureuses au bain Sakura
